welcome_message_body: "Welcome to American Canyon! Nestled in the heart of Napa Valley, our charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes, renowned wineries, and friendly community. We invite you to experience all we have to offer and make unforgettable memories here. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Napa County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For passengers flying on private jets, there is a separate terminal with exclusive facilities and services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buchanan Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is the main hub for the airport.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport is where all commercial flights are located.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
